# ion-keyboard-controller



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Events

#### keyboardDidHide

Emitted after the keyboard has hidden.


#### keyboardDidShow

Emitted after the keyboard has shown.


#### keyboardWillHide

Emitted before the keyboard has hidden.


#### keyboardWillShow

Emitted before the keyboard has shown.
